description: Get the specified schema by its unique ID assigned when a version of the schema is created or registered. Schema versions in Deleted status will not be included in the results.

parameters.name: SchemaId
parameters.description: This is a wrapper structure to contain schema identity fields. The structure contains: SchemaId$SchemaArn: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the schema. Either SchemaArn or SchemaName and RegistryName has to be provided. SchemaId$SchemaName: The name of the schema. SchemaArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the schema. One of SchemaArn or SchemaName has to be provided. SchemaName (string) --- The name of the schema. RegistryName (string) --- The name of the schema registry that contains the schema.

parameters.name: SchemaVersionNumber
parameters.description: The version number of the schema. LatestVersion (boolean) --- The latest version available for the schema. VersionNumber (integer) --- The version number of the schema.

nested_params.name: LatestVersion
nested_params.description: The latest version available for the schema.

nested_params.name: VersionNumber
nested_params.description: The version number of the schema.

nested_items.name: SchemaVersionId
nested_items.description: The SchemaVersionId of the schema version.

nested_items.name: SchemaDefinition
nested_items.description: The schema definition for the schema ID.

nested_items.name: DataFormat
nested_items.description: The data format of the schema definition. Currently AVRO, JSON and PROTOBUF are supported.

nested_items.name: SchemaArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the schema.

nested_items.name: VersionNumber
nested_items.description: The version number of the schema.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the schema version.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the schema version was created.
